section.heading: Deadline for appointment of Inspector General.

para.heading: In general. —
para.text: Not later than 30 days after its members are appointed, the Mayor shall appoint the Inspector General of the District of Columbia pursuant to § 1-301.115a(a)(1).

para.heading: Transition rule. —
para.text: The term of service of the individual serving as the Inspector General under § 1-301.115a(a) prior to the appointment of the Inspector General by the Authority under § 1-301.115a(a)(1) shall expire upon the appointment of the Inspector General by the Authority.

annotations.annotation: ‘Its members’, referred to in subsec. (a), are the members of the District of Columbia Financial Responsibility and Management Assistance Authority.
